spells.name: Compel Hostility
spells.description: Compels opponents to attack you instead of your allies.

spells.name: Jury-Rig
spells.description: Removes the broken condition from the targeted object.

spells.name: Life Conduit
spells.description: You are bound even tighter to your eidolon than normal, and may share hit points with it through your life link ability.
